description: Investigation scripts registry for system-monitor scenario

swap-heavy-processes.name: Swap Heavy Process Detector
swap-heavy-processes.description: Identifies processes consuming excessive swap memory and provides recommendations
swap-heavy-processes.author: claude-agent

resource-exhaustion-detector.name: Resource Exhaustion Pattern Detector
resource-exhaustion-detector.description: Detects resource exhaustion patterns including swap usage, memory pressure, and process limits
resource-exhaustion-detector.author: claude-agent

judge0-worker-exhaustion-detector.name: Judge0 Worker Memory Exhaustion Detector
judge0-worker-exhaustion-detector.description: Detects Judge0 workers approaching memory limits and provides tuning recommendations
judge0-worker-exhaustion-detector.author: claude-agent

container-resource-optimizer.name: Container Resource Optimizer
container-resource-optimizer.description: Analyzes container resource usage vs limits and provides optimization recommendations
container-resource-optimizer.author: claude-agent

high-cpu-analysis.name: High CPU Analysis
high-cpu-analysis.description: Identifies processes consuming excessive CPU and traces their origins
high-cpu-analysis.author: claude-agent

process-genealogy.name: Process Genealogy Tracer
process-genealogy.description: Traces parent-child relationships to find process spawn sources
process-genealogy.author: claude-agent

resource-leak-detector.name: Resource Leak Detector
resource-leak-detector.description: Detects file descriptor, memory, and connection leaks
resource-leak-detector.author: claude-agent

network-anomaly-detector.name: Network Anomaly Detector
network-anomaly-detector.description: Detects suspicious network connections, unusual ports, and potential security issues
network-anomaly-detector.author: claude-agent

zombie-process-detector.name: Zombie Process Detector
zombie-process-detector.description: Detects and analyzes zombie (defunct) processes to identify parent process issues
zombie-process-detector.author: claude-agent

disk-io-analyzer.name: Disk I/O Analyzer
disk-io-analyzer.description: Analyzes disk usage patterns, I/O performance, and identifies storage bottlenecks
disk-io-analyzer.author: claude-agent

hello-test-investigation.name: Hello Test Investigation
hello-test-investigation.description: Test investigation script that provides friendly system greeting
hello-test-investigation.author: claude-agent

test-spawn-detector.name: Test Spawn Detector
test-spawn-detector.description: Detects test harness processes, fork storms, and multiprocessing leaks
test-spawn-detector.author: claude-agent

python-subprocess-health.name: Python Subprocess Health Monitor
python-subprocess-health.description: Detects Python processes with zombie children and poor subprocess management
python-subprocess-health.author: claude-agent

container-zombie-analyzer.name: Container Zombie Analyzer
container-zombie-analyzer.description: Advanced zombie process analysis for containerized applications with parent tracking
container-zombie-analyzer.author: claude-agent

enhanced-zombie-analyzer.name: Enhanced Zombie Analyzer
enhanced-zombie-analyzer.description: Advanced zombie process detection with parent analysis and timeline tracking
enhanced-zombie-analyzer.author: claude-agent

cpu-usage-comprehensive.name: Comprehensive CPU Usage Analysis
cpu-usage-comprehensive.description: Detailed analysis of high CPU usage including process trees, zombie detection, and resource usage
cpu-usage-comprehensive.author: claude-agent

api-infinite-loop-detector.name: API Infinite Loop Detector
api-infinite-loop-detector.description: Detects and diagnoses infinite loop conditions in Go API services
api-infinite-loop-detector.author: claude-agent

go-busy-loop-detector.name: Go Busy Loop Detector
go-busy-loop-detector.description: Detects Go processes with busy polling loops consuming excessive CPU
go-busy-loop-detector.author: claude-agent

chrome-cpu-analyzer.name: Chrome High CPU Analyzer
chrome-cpu-analyzer.description: Detects and analyzes Chrome processes consuming excessive CPU
chrome-cpu-analyzer.author: claude-agent

memory-leak-detector.name: Memory Leak and Process Health Detector
memory-leak-detector.description: Detects memory leaks, long-running processes, and resource consumption patterns
memory-leak-detector.author: claude-agent

judge0-container-monitor.name: Judge0 Container Health Monitor
judge0-container-monitor.description: Monitors judge0 worker containers for memory exhaustion and performance issues
judge0-container-monitor.author: claude-agent

judge0-memory-optimizer.name: Judge0 Memory Optimizer
judge0-memory-optimizer.description: Detects and optimizes Judge0 worker memory exhaustion patterns

judge0-cpu-investigation.description: Investigates high CPU usage from Judge0 worker containers and Redis interactions

judge0-memory-analyzer.name: Judge0 Memory Analyzer
judge0-memory-analyzer.description: Analyzes Judge0 worker memory usage, swap pressure, and container tuning opportunities

service-health-monitor.name: Service Health Monitor
service-health-monitor.description: Detects failed systemd services and provides recovery recommendations

container-health-comprehensive.description: Detects unhealthy containers, health check failures, and provides recovery recommendations

performance.description: CPU, memory, and general performance issues
